src.util.eval_util module¶

This module provides evaluation utilities for word spotting.


src.util.eval_util.ap(bin_relevance, n_occ)[source]¶

calculates the average precision (AP) for a given sequence of relevant hits

Parameters

bin_relevance – binary list of relevant elements in retrieval list

Returns

MAP of sequence

src.util.eval_util.map(bin_relevances, occs)[source]¶

calculates mean average precision (MAP) for the relevant hits of retrieval lists

src.util.eval_util.overlap(bbox1, bbox2)[source]¶

Assumption: rectangular bboxes, not areas

Parameters

  • bbox1 – bbox_img of gt

  • bbox2 – bbox_img of retrieval list

Returns

percentage of area occupied from the gt-bbox_img by the retrieval list-bbox_img and the occupied bounding box in that order

src.util.eval_util.relevance(arr_bbox_est, arr_bbox_gt, arr_form_est, arr_form_gt)[source]¶

calculates a binary list of relevant elements in a retrieval list

Parameters

  • arr_bbox_est – bounding boxes of retrieval list

  • arr_bbox_gt – bounding boxes of elements with the desired transcription

  • arr_form_est – page-names/paths of the retrieval list

  • arr_form_gt – page-names/path of elements with the desired transcription

Returns

binary list indicating relevance of elements in the retrieval list

src.util.eval_util.ret_list_idcs(attr_vec, phoc_list, metric='cosine')[source]¶

idcs of sorted retrival list, based on a given metric
